Name: Ravindra Jadeja
Teams: India, India U19, Rajasthan Royals, Saurashtra, Board Presidents XI, Kochi Tuskers Kerala, Chennai Super Kings, India B, Indians, India A, Gujarat Lions, India Blue, Rest of India
Bio: "First they ignore you,then they laugh at you,could well have meant to say this about Ravindra Jadeja,The best of observers ignored his left-arm spin at first,then he was ridiculed for his three triple-centuries in Ranji Trophy,the idea of Jadeja the Test player was contested when India hed him a debut in 2012-13 against conventional wisdom,but Jadeja won them all over with over after over of unerring accuracy,sits among the elite of Indian spin bowling now
